customer_addr:
2976 E. State St Suite 120 #211
Eagle, ID 83616

citations.narrative:
According to the facility’s records, two parakeets in the walk-in aviary died. On March 16, 2024, a bird was stepped on,
causing crushing trauma that led to its death. Guests are allowed to enter the aviary to feed a seed mixture to the free
flying parakeets. While feeding, some seed falls on the ground and the birds land on the ground to eat the seed. This
places the parakeets at the feet of the public. The second parakeet died on August 28, 2024. During the cleaning of a
party area outside the enclosure, balloons were popped. This stressed the parakeets inside the aviary, and they took
flight. One parakeet flew into the wall and died from the trauma received from the impact.
The facility must take measures to ensure the handling of the animals does not cause trauma or physical harm.
Correct by June 10, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.131(b)(1)  Critical
   
Handling of animals. 
According to the facility’s records, two parakeets in the walk-in aviary died. On March 16, 2024, a bird was stepped on, 
causing crushing trauma that led to its death. Guests are allowed to enter the aviary to feed a seed mixture to the free 
flying parakeets. While feeding, some seed falls on the ground and the birds land on the ground to eat the seed. This 
places the parakeets at the feet of the public. The second parakeet died on August 28, 2024. During the cleaning of a 
party area outside the enclosure, balloons were popped. This stressed the parakeets inside the aviary, and they took 
flight. One parakeet flew into the wall and died from the trauma received from the impact. 
The facility must take measures to ensure the handling of the animals does not cause trauma or physical harm. 
Correct by June 10, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
